allowed(Term) - Static method in class buzztaiki.lucene.lastuni.CJKSingleCharQuery

B

buzztaiki.lucene.lastuni - package buzztaiki.lucene.lastuni
 

C

CJKLastUniGramAnalyzer - Class in buzztaiki.lucene.lastuni
An Analyzer that tokenizes text with StandardTokenizer, normalizes content with CJKWidthFilter, folds case with LowerCaseFilter, forms bigrams of CJK with CJKBigramFilter, split last bigram terms with CJKLastUniGramFilter, and filters stopwords with StopFilter
CJKLastUniGramAnalyzer(Version, boolean) - Constructor for class buzztaiki.lucene.lastuni.CJKLastUniGramAnalyzer
Builds an analyzer which removes words in CJKAnalyzer.getDefaultStopSet().
CJKLastUniGramAnalyzer(Version, CharArraySet, boolean) - Constructor for class buzztaiki.lucene.lastuni.CJKLastUniGramAnalyzer
Builds an analyzer with the given stop words
CJKLastUniGramFilter - Class in buzztaiki.lucene.lastuni
Tokenize last CJK words as uni-gram.
CJKLastUniGramFilter(TokenStream, boolean) - Constructor for class buzztaiki.lucene.lastuni.CJKLastUniGramFilter
 
CJKLastUniGramFilterFactory - Class in buzztaiki.lucene.lastuni
